instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> b
threads.message: Hello, this macbook has a problem that it does not have sound through the speakers, it appears as blocked when pressing the button, it has already been tried with other speakers; I would like an indication to solve the problem

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> b
threads.message:
Do you have the red light inside audio connector?
Remove <RESISTOR>R6805</RESISTOR> and test again.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> b
threads.message: no red light inside audio conector, remove <RESISTOR>R6805</RESISTOR> , I removed <RESISTOR>R6805</RESISTOR> and the macbook has audio
